question: What drug cures hepatitis C?
ideal_answer: Sofosbuvir-based therapy cures hepatitis C virus infection

snippets.text: Sofosbuvir-based therapy cures hepatitis C virus infection
Sofosbuvir-based therapy cures hepatitis c virus infection after prior treatment failures in a patient with concurrent lymphoma.
The emerging archetypal example is the outcry over the cost of sofosbuvir, a drug proved to cure hepatitis C infection
